verses.name: Zephaniah 2:1
verses.text: Gather yourselves together, yea, gather together, O nation not desired;

verses.name: Zephaniah 2:2
verses.text: Before the decree bring forth, before the day pass as the chaff, before the fierce anger of the Lord come upon you, before the day of the Lord’s anger come upon you.

verses.name: Zephaniah 2:3
verses.text: Seek ye the Lord, all ye meek of the earth, which have wrought his judgment; seek righteousness, seek meekness: it may be ye shall be hid in the day of the Lord’s anger.

verses.name: Zephaniah 2:4
verses.text: For Gaza shall be forsaken, and Ashkelon a desolation: they shall drive out Ashdod at the noon day, and Ekron shall be rooted up.
